code: import actionTypes from'../constants/actionTypes';import runtimeEnv from'@mars/heroku-js-runtime-env';function itemsFetched(items){return{type:actionTypes.FETCH_ITEMS,items:items};}function itemFetched(item){return{type:actionTypes.FETCH_ITEM,selectedItem:item};}function itemSet(item){return{type:actionTypes.SET_ITEM,selectedItem:item};}function checkoutSet(data){return{type:actionTypes.SET_CHECKOUT,name:data.name,cardNum:data.cardNum,charity:data.charity,payedAmt:data.payedAmt,donatedAmt:data.donatedAmt,donationStatus:data.donationStatus,shipAdr:data.shipAdr};}export function setCheckout(data){return function(dispatch){dispatch(checkoutSet(data));};}export function setItem(item){return function(dispatch){dispatch(itemSet(item));};}export function fetchItem(itemId){var env=runtimeEnv();return function(dispatch){return fetch("".concat(env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/items/").concat(itemId),{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':localStorage.getItem('token')},mode:'cors'}).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw Error(response.statusText);}return response.json();}).then(function(res){dispatch(itemFetched(res));}).catch(function(e){return console.log(e);});};}export function fetchItems(){var env=runtimeEnv();return function(dispatch){return fetch("".concat(env.REACT_APP_API_URL,"/items"),{method:'GET',headers:{'Accept':'application/json','Content-Type':'application/json','Authorization':localStorage.getItem('token')},mode:'cors'}).then(function(response){if(!response.ok){throw Error(response.statusText);}return response.json();}).then(function(res){dispatch(itemsFetched(res.Items));}).catch(function(e){return console.log(e);});};}
